source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_00<tab>By the look on her face, Ryne can scarce believe that the Empty is restored.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_00<tab>無の大地のリーンは、ガイアとともに、エデンを見つめている。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_01<tab>Surrounded by an abundance of verdant flora, Ryne and Gaia celebrate the fulfillment of their dream to revive the Empty. Exhausted from their efforts, Ryne suggests returning to Mord Souq for some long-overdue rest and relaxation.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_01<tab>リーンと話した。どうやら、ガイアの記憶は完全には失われずに済んだようだ。アム・アレーンの物見櫓にいる「ガイア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_02<tab>After alighting from the skyslipper by the Derrick, Gaia ponders the idea of acquiring a hovering transportation device of her own. For the time being, however, your only option is to make the rest of the journey to Mord Souq on foot, where Yalfort awaits your report.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_02<tab>ガイアと話した。調査完了の報告をするため、アム・アレーンのモルド・スークにいる「ヤルフォート」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_03<tab>Yalfort is delighted to hear that your work in the Empty has yielded the desired results. He also reveals that the investigations into Gaia's past in Eulmore have been successful. However, she is quick to state that she has no desire to learn more about that chapter of her life, instead choosing to focus on building a brighter future in the Crystarium with Ryne. Though none can say what the morrow holds, you rest easy in the knowledge that these two dear friends will surely make the most of their lives.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_03<tab>ヤルフォートと話した。今度こそ緑が蘇り、無の大地に関する調査は完了となった。ガイアは、その名とともに、己の正体を受け入れた。ゆえに、未来に語り継いでいくのだろう。いつか再び生まれてくる命たちの物語を。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_04<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_SEQ_04<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gaia at the Derrick.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_TODO_00<tab>物見櫓のガイアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yalfort.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_TODO_01<tab>ヤルフォートと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_000<tab>I'm thrilled that we've been able to restore the Empty, but I can't stop thinking about Mitron and Loghrif. It seems to me that they were only bound to their duty because of their memories.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_000かつて転生を果たしたミトロンとアログリフは、
幸か不幸か、記憶を取り戻してしまったがゆえに、
アシエンとしての使命に縛られてしまった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_001<tab>It seems that there's something within that doesn't want to be forgotten. Their souls live on, no matter how many times they go through the cycle of death and rebirth.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_001私のように、すべて忘れたまま生きられていたら、
どんなに楽だったことか。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_002<tab>I wonder what their lives would've been like if they'd never remembered, and had carried on living amongst us mortals. Then again, I suppose I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> Loghrif, in a way, but still me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_002それでも忘れたくない、忘れられたくない。
取り戻せるなら取り戻したい。
……それほどまでに、素敵な思い出だったのね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_010<tab>I still can't believe this is happening─it's a dream come true!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_010……こうして願いが叶ったことが、いまだに信じられません。
本当に、私たちがやったんですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_011<tab>I just wish the others were here to see it.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_011<tab>この景色を、みんなにも見せたかったな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_A1_000_001<tab>I'll be sure to tell them all about it.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_A1_000_001<tab>自分の口から、必ず伝えるよ

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_A1_000_002<tab>Perhaps Gaia could pay them a visit and share the good news?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_A1_000_002<tab>ガイアなら、会いにいけるかも？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_012<tab>Yes, I suppose that's the next best thing. Hold on─you might even be able to take something with you to show them!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_012ぜひ、お願いします！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんなら、あちらの世界に
物を運ぶこともできるんですよね？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_013<tab>I'll bet the fruit that grows here could be used to make all sorts of delicious treats!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_013それなら、こっちの名物とか珍味とかを、
お土産に持っていっていただければ、
みんなに喜んでもらえるでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_014<tab>You could even make something yourself, Ryne.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_014そこは、リーンが手作りしたらどうかしら？
成長したところをみせるチャンスじゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_015<tab>That's a great idea, but my cooking can be a bit hit-or-miss... Maybe once we get back to the Crystarium, I'll ask for some advice!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_015それもそうだね……！
クリスタリウムに戻ったら、ミーン工芸館の食薬科の人たちに、
いろいろ教えてもらおうかな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_016<tab>Gaia? But how would she do that?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_016<tab>ええっ、そうなんですか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_017<tab>Well, Ascians can travel between worlds, can't they?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_017ああ……そういえば、アシエンたちは次元を超えて、
この世界にやってきたとかなんとか、
ミトロンが言っていたわね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_018<tab>I might be able to do it, too, if I find a way to use my Ascian powers. It may prove a bit tricky now that I'm separated from Mitron, though.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_018アシエンの術を思い出せれば、可能かもしれないけど……
ミトロンの「接続」が解けた今、私だけじゃ難しいでしょうね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_019<tab>Well, to be honest, I'd like it if you stay in this world, at least for a while. We still have so much to do together, after all!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_019でもそれって……
ガイアがもうどこにも行かないってことだよね？
だったらむしろ、良かったかも！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_020<tab>Actually, I wanted to ask something. When you say “the others,” do you mean Thancred, the bookworm, and Urianger, your knight in shining armor?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_020ところでその、みんなって……。
サンクレッドが物知りお兄さんで……
ウリエンジェが名付け親で師匠、だったわよね？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_021<tab>Haha! No, it's the other way around!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_021<tab>ちがうよガイア、逆、逆！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_022<tab>Oh, is it? Hmm, seems my memory's even less reliable than it was before.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_022あら、そうだったかしら……？
どうやら完全には記憶を消されずに済んだみたいだけど、
まだ頭の中で整理が追いついてなくて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_023<tab>The main thing is, the whispering in my head has stopped, so I shouldn't have any more bouts of amnesia. Even so, there's a part of me that'll miss hearing the faerie's voice...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_023でも、これからはもう、
『見えない妖精』の声を聞くこともないのね。
いざいなくなると、ちょっぴり寂しさを感じるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_024<tab>I know how you feel, Gaia. Anyway, we've all been through rather a lot, so why don't we head back to civilization for some much-needed rest?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_024……そろそろ帰って休もう。
この周辺のエーテルも落ち着いてきたとはいえ、
ふかふかなベッドにはかなわないから！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_025<tab>All right. Leave the piloting to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_025<tab>それじゃ、運転は任せて！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_030<tab>I know she insisted on piloting the skyslipper, but given her recent exertions, perhaps it wasn't such a good idea?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_030もう、ガイアったら……
ごまかしてたけど、また足をつりそうになってた。
私も運転おぼえようかなぁ？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_040<tab>I understand that keeping the skyslipper here allows us to save fuel from traveling all the way back to Mord Souq, but can't we just carry a bit extra? It's not easy crossing the desert in these heels, you know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_040なるほど、往復の燃料の都合で、
ここに停めておかざるを得ないのね。
……寄り道してたら、危ないところだったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_041<tab>I seem to remember you weren't too enthused when I suggested buying some nice, sensible walking boots... Come to think of it, maybe we should rest here for a while. You must be tired after all that piloting.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_041ガイア、運転おつかれさま！
ちょっと休憩する？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_042<tab>I'm fine. Besides, I had the two of you to keep me company. It was over before I knew it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_042大丈夫よ、ありがとう。
みんなでおしゃべりしてたらあっという間だったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_043<tab>Taking in the scenery with the wind in my hair really helped clear out the cobwebs, too. Perhaps I should see about getting my very own skyslipper...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_043移りゆく景色を眺めてると、いろんな考えが頭によぎるの。
気分転換したいときに、ちょうどいいかもしれないわね。
これ、自分用に購入できないかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_044<tab>What!? You can't just buy one! Even if you could, they'd cost a fortune!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_044<tab>お金持ち……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_045<tab>Oh, I'm sorry. That must be my Eulmoran upbringing speaking. I'll have you know, I'm <var 1A 02 /var>almost<var 1A 01 /var> as comfortable in more humble surroundings, like Mord Souq, for example. That reminds me, it's time we made our way there and told Yalfort all about...well, everything.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_045それじゃ、モルド・スークに戻って、
「ヤルフォート」さんに報告しましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_050<tab>After all of the unimaginable things we've seen in the Empty, it's nice to get back to a bit of normality for a change.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_050ここに帰ってくると安心します。
あの場所も、いつかそんなふうに、
誰かに安らぎを与えられるような場所になるといいですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_051<tab>I'll say one thing for this place: for better or worse, I'll never forget the smell.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_051ここの匂いには相変わらず慣れないけど……。
目で見たものや、耳で聞いたものだけじゃなく、
匂いもまた、記憶に訴えかけるものがあるのね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_060<tab>Welcome back! I take it all is well in the Empty?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_060お帰りなさい！
「無の大地」の様子は、いかがでしたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_061<tab>It is now! Not everything went quite as we'd planned─to put it mildly─but we managed to revive the ambient aether. Now all we need to do is wait for the changes to become widespread.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_061いろいろありましたけど……作戦は、大成功です！
きっとこれから、もっともっと広い地域にわたって、
大地に属性が蘇っていくはずです。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_062<tab>Truly!? Wonderful! Just wonderful! I shall share the tidings with our inner circle...and perhaps it is time more people knew of your expeditions as well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_062それは素晴らしい！
そろそろ「無の大地」に関する情報を解禁して、
より多くの人間で調査にあたってもよいかもしれませんね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_063<tab>Of course, we'll continue to monitor the situation, but I'm sure it won't be long before we can allow members of the citizenry to make their own forays into the Empty.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_063今後は、我々の方でも経過観察を行うようにいたします。
あらためまして、本当におつかれさまでした……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_070<tab>I'm pleased to say that I too have some good news to share. Our investigators in Eulmore have finally found information pertaining to Gaia's true identity!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_070実は、こちらからも嬉しいお報せがあるんです。
ユールモアに調査を依頼していた、
ガイア様の御家族に関する戸籍情報が見つかったんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_071<tab>Really!?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_071<tab>本当ですか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_072<tab>As it pertains to matters of a private nature, the information is being treated as highly confidential, so I haven't actually looked at it myself, but I imagine it includes Gaia's real name...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_072プライバシーに関わることですので、
私も内容を確認してはいませんが、
おそらく、ガイア様の本当の名前もわかるかと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_073<tab>To be honest, I'd prefer not to know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_073悪いけど……
その話、聞かなかったことにするわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_074<tab>But why?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_074<tab>えっ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_075<tab>You see, I've come to learn a lot about my past, even before my life in Eulmore.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_075今回の「無の大地」に関する調査作戦を通じて、
本当にいろんなことがわかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_076<tab>I know now that I'm the reincarnation of Loghrif, an Ascian. And Mitron, the one who was transformed into Eden...was someone very special to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_076私はアシエン・アログリフの生まれ変わりで、
エデンは光に呑まれて変わり果てた、
大切なトモダチ、ミトロンだった。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_077<tab>For a hundred years, Mitron called out to me in the hope we'd be reunited. But there was no answer.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_077罪喰いとなったミトロンは、100年間ずっとひとりで、
誰にも自分の名前を呼んでもらえず、
誰にも自分の叫びに応えてもらえず……

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_078<tab>Even so, Mitron held on to those precious memories of our life together, and stopped at nothing to make them a reality once more.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_078それでもアログリフの名を呼び続けた。
きっといつかまた、幸せだったあのころのように、
素敵な明日が来ると信じて。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_079<tab>I know now that Mitron wanted the same as us. Wanted the world to be as it once was.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_079そうか……。
ミトロンは、過去を取り戻したかったんじゃない。
停滞した今から、未来に進みたかったんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_080<tab>Yes. It's a shame that things turned out the way they did. In those hundred years of solitude, that dream became an obsession.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_080その声は、あくまでも希望に満ちた願いだった。
たったひとりで100年間、育て続けた希望の種子。
ただ、その声に応える者がいなかっただけ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_081<tab>I would've likewise succumbed to the Darkness within if it weren't for Ryne and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If someone had also been there for Mitron, who knows what might've happened?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_081私も、そばで名前を呼んでくれるリーンがいなかったら、
ミトロンのように闇に呑まれていたかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_082<tab>That's why, from now on, I want to help those in need, to give <var 1A 02 /var>their<var 1A 01 /var> dreams a chance to come true.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_082だから私は、その願いの声に応えて、
希望の種子を芽吹かせられる人間になりたい。
そのために、ガイアという名前のままでいたいのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_083<tab>For me, the name Gaia symbolizes hope. And though each of our lives may be but a drop in the great river of time, hope springs eternal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_083いつか再び生まれてくる命たちがめぐりあう、
理想郷の象徴となれるように……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_084<tab>Gaia...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_084<tab>ガイア……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_085<tab>So...I'm sorry. While I appreciate your efforts to find my past, I'm looking to the future now. As Gaia.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_085<tab>せっかく調べてくれたのに、ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_086<tab>No need to apologize, Miss Gaia. As long as you are happy, then so are we!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_086とんでもない。
我々は、ガイア様の意向を尊重いたしますよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_087<tab>Right, I expect my colleagues will be keen to turn their attention to the Empty. If you'll excuse me, I have expeditions to arrange! Till next time!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_YALFORT_000_087<tab>それでは、我々は調査支援の後処理に取りかかります。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_088<tab>So, what shall we do now?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_RYNE_000_088<tab>……さて、私たちはこれからどうしよう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_089<tab>Come on, Ryne. Don't tell me you've forgotten.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_089<tab>あら、私の予定はもう決まってるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_090<tab>The festival at the Crystarium, remember? And don't even think about leaving me out. I wouldn't miss it for the world!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA305_03979_GAIA_000_090水晶祭の実行委員、やるんでしょう？
思いっきり盛り上げてやろうじゃない！
